name: Mr. Howell (Daiquiri With Scotch and Maple)
description: This Daiquiri variation gets a little boost from rich maple syrup and an extra-savory, smoky edge from half an ounce of peaty Islay Scotch.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce (20ml) fresh juice from 1 large or 2 small limes
1/2 ounce (15ml) peaty Islay Scotch, such as Laphroaig

recipeInstructions.text: Add rum, lime juice, maple syrup, and Scotch to a cocktail shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Double-strain into a coupe glass, garnish with lime wheel, and serve immediately.
